testimonials.name: BladeMaster99
testimonials.comment: The most intense combat experience I've ever had! The physics are incredible and every slash feels satisfying.

testimonials.name: SlashQueen
testimonials.comment: Amazing game! The enemy AI is challenging but fair, and the weapon upgrades make each playthrough unique.

testimonials.name: CombatKing
testimonials.comment: Finally, a stickman game that doesn't feel clunky. The controls are smooth and responsive.

testimonials.name: WarriorX
testimonials.comment: The visual effects are stunning! Every blood splatter and particle effect adds to the immersion.

weapons.name: Steel Katana
weapons.description: A razor-sharp blade with enhanced cutting power and extended reach.

weapons.name: Combat Gauntlets
weapons.description: Reinforced fighting gloves that increase attack speed and combo potential.

weapons.name: Thunder Axe
weapons.description: A massive battle axe that deals devastating damage but slows movement.

weapons.name: Phantom Dagger
weapons.description: A mystical blade that can phase through armor and deal critical hits.

weapons.name: Shadow Scythe
weapons.description: A deadly curved blade that harvests souls and grants stealth abilities.

weapons.name: Dragon's Breath
weapons.description: A flaming sword that ignites enemies and leaves burning trails.
